Articles.Content:
Dear colleagues,

after lurking in these here forums for a while, I thought I'd register and introduce myself.

My name is Sebastian, hailing from Germany. I have been a fan of space travel ever since I watched my first episode of Star Trek on TV.

Space flight simulators have always held a certain amount of interest for me. I sort of started my career ages ago with MS Space Flight Simulator. Then I was trying out Orbiter on and off in various versions, but always found it kinda challenging.

Then KSP came along. I was torn between semi-bad experiences with some other indie games, curiosity and interest in the topic. Them I came across Scott Manleys YouTube channel and was hooked.

Since then I have learned so much about orbital mechanics and rocket science, it is amazing. So I also want to take the opportunity to thank Squad for the good work they are doing and of course the community as well for providing those awesome mods. This is really what get's the game going!

So long for now,

Sebastian

Welcome to the forums StarStreak! Hope you enjoy your stay.

Cheers,

~Claw
